BuffData.DynamicTooltip:
Dragon Slayer (@Stack@)Slaying the Dragon steals part of it's power. Slaying 5 or more Dragons grants Aspect of the Dragon for a short time.

Dragon's Might: +8% Attack Damage and Ability Power
Dragon's Dominance: +15% damage to Minions and Monsters
Dragon's Flight: +5% Movement Speed
Dragon's Wrath: +15% damage to Towers and Buildings
Aspect of the Dragon: Doubles other bonuses and your attacks burn enemies for 150 true damage over 3 seconds. Lasts 180 seconds.Source: @SourceName@
